name: Cursed Hollywood Actor
description:
Use WASD to move and use your mouse to aim. Left mouse button is to shoot.

You play as a Hollwood actor that has been cursed and stuck inside of a movie with unlimited ammo. There are other actors being zombies that are trying to kill you because you are cursed.

This is a game made in 48 hours for the Kenney Game Jam for the theme CURSED.

This game was very challenging for me. The spawning the enemy outside of the screen was hard to do and it doesn't even work the way I want it at the moment. and the enemy AI movement is alright for now but not perfect.
